Vectorized tests

Source: R/vectorized_tests.R
test_wilcoxon.Rd

Vectorized tests

test_wilcoxon(X, Y)

test_kruskalwallis(X, Y)

test_fisher(X, Y)

Arguments

X

matrix with samples in columns and taxa in rows
Y

vector of condition

Value

A list with a p.value component and eventually a e.sign component.

Examples

head(test_wilcoxon(alcohol$X, alcohol$Y)$p.value)
#>       14531         283        7781       16688        3494        6293 
#> 0.025757321 0.019732819 0.043370553 0.358103814 0.009946997 0.668781960 
head(test_kruskalwallis(alcohol$X, alcohol$Y)$p.value)
#>       14531         283        7781       16688        3494        6293 
#> 0.025329943 0.019545224 0.042827899 0.356137205 0.009844709 0.664068846 
head(test_fisher(alcohol$X, alcohol$Y)$p.value)
#>      14531        283       7781      16688       3494       6293 
#> 0.02750782 0.13159538 0.12391791 0.89293842 0.02341283 0.37031187
